articles.author: Anthony D'Alessandro
articles.title: 'Wicked': How Jon M. Chu Revived Musical Into Box Office Movie Hit - Deadline
articles.description: Podcast interview with Jon M. Chu about the making of 'Wicked', why he divided into two-parts and the future of 'Crazy Rich Asians'
articles.content:
It’s a death-defying act to split one property into two movies. 
Warner Bros did it with the greatest of ease on the final film adaptation of Harry Potter, 2010 and 2011’s Deathly Hallows, which com… [+2838 chars]
